properties.description: Array of device types for dropdown

properties.name: List of Interface Templates
properties.description: Array of interface templates for dropdown

properties.name: List of Device Roles
properties.description: Array of device roles for dropdown

Adds one or more switches to an existing site in NetBox.

Workflow:
1. Fetches tenants, sites, device types, device roles, and interface templates from NetBox
2. Prompts user to select options and enter serial numbers (standalone mode)
3. Or accepts input variables from master workflow (sub-workflow mode)
4. Determines next available device index based on existing devices at the site
5. For each serial number:
   - Creates a new device with name pattern sw{site_number}-{index}
   - Sets custom fields: ccc_template_name, ccc_pid
   - Updates the uplink interface label to 'Uplink'

Prerequisites:
- Atomic workflows must be imported
- NetBox target must be configured

properties.script:
import json
import sys

serial_numbers_input = sys.argv[1]

# Parse serial numbers
serial_numbers = [sn.strip() for sn in serial_numbers_input.split(',') if sn.strip()]
serial_numbers_array = json.dumps(serial_numbers)
serial_count = len(serial_numbers)

print(f"Parsed {serial_count} serial numbers from input")

import json
import sys

tenants = json.loads(sys.argv[1]) if sys.argv[1] else []
sites = json.loads(sys.argv[2]) if sys.argv[2] else []
device_types = json.loads(sys.argv[3]) if sys.argv[3] else []
device_roles = json.loads(sys.argv[4]) if sys.argv[4] else []
interface_templates = json.loads(sys.argv[5]) if sys.argv[5] else []

tenant_list = json.dumps([{"id": str(t.get("id", "")), "name": t.get("name", "")} for t in tenants])
site_list = json.dumps([{"id": str(s.get("id", "")), "name": s.get("name", "")} for s in sites])
device_type_list = json.dumps([{"id": str(dt.get("id", "")), "name": dt.get("model", ""), "part_number": dt.get("part_number", "")} for dt in device_types])
device_role_list = json.dumps([{"id": str(dr.get("id", "")), "name": dr.get("name", "")} for dr in device_roles])
interface_template_list = json.dumps([{"id": str(it.get("id", "")), "name": it.get("name", "")} for it in interface_templates])

properties.description: Collect information to add switches to a site
properties.prompt_body:
Please provide the following information to add switches:

• **Tenant**: Select the NetBox tenant
• **Site**: Select the site where switches will be added
• **Device Type**: Select the switch device type
• **Device Role**: Select the device role
• **Device Uplink**: Select the uplink interface template
• **Serial Numbers**: Enter serial numbers (comma-separated)

actions.name: Execute Python Script
actions.title: Extract Prompt Values and Parse Serial Numbers

properties.display_name: Extract Prompt Values and Parse Serial Numbers
properties.script:
import json
import sys
import re

# Parse JSON objects from dropdown selections
tenant_obj = json.loads(sys.argv[1]) if sys.argv[1] else {}
site_obj = json.loads(sys.argv[2]) if sys.argv[2] else {}
device_type_obj = json.loads(sys.argv[3]) if sys.argv[3] else {}
device_role_obj = json.loads(sys.argv[4]) if sys.argv[4] else {}
uplink_obj = json.loads(sys.argv[5]) if sys.argv[5] else {}
serial_numbers_input = sys.argv[6]
device_types_json = sys.argv[7]

# Extract IDs and names from selected objects
tenant_id = tenant_obj.get('id', '')
site_id = site_obj.get('id', '')
site_name = site_obj.get('name', '')
device_type_id = device_type_obj.get('id', '')
device_role_id = device_role_obj.get('id', '')
uplink_interface_name = uplink_obj.get('name', '')

# Parse serial numbers
serial_numbers = [sn.strip() for sn in serial_numbers_input.split(',') if sn.strip()]
serial_numbers_array = json.dumps(serial_numbers)
serial_count = len(serial_numbers)

# Extract site number from site name
site_number_match = re.search(r'\d+$', site_name)
site_number = site_number_match.group() if site_number_match else 'unknown'

# Get part number from device types list
device_types = json.loads(device_types_json) if device_types_json else []
part_number = next((dt.get('part_number', '') for dt in device_types if str(dt.get('id', '')) == device_type_id), '')

import json
import sys
import re

devices = json.loads(sys.argv[1]) if sys.argv[1] else []
site_number = sys.argv[2]

existing_indices = []
for device in devices:
    device_name = device.get('name', '')
    match = re.search(rf'^sw{site_number}-(\d+)$', device_name)
    if match:
        existing_indices.append(int(match.group(1)))

next_index = max(existing_indices, default=0) + 1

import json
import sys

serials = json.loads(sys.argv[1]) if sys.argv[1] else []
index = int(sys.argv[2])

current_serial = serials[index] if index < len(serials) else ''

import json
import sys

devices = json.loads(sys.argv[1]) if sys.argv[1] else []
device_exists = len(devices) > 0

import sys
site_number = sys.argv[1]
device_index = int(sys.argv[2])
device_name = f'sw{site_number}-{device_index}'

import sys
new_serial_count = int(sys.argv[1]) + 1
new_device_index = int(sys.argv[2]) + 1

properties.result_message: Successfully finished adding switches to the site
